patthana16.37:4.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparittārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.37:4.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe terasa … pe … vipāke sattarasa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana16.37:5.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namahaggatārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
